page.title: 05Where Peterlee People Work.
page.content: {Peterlee}is a new town.It has a town centre with large shops like{Fine Fare and{Woolworth,}as well as many smaller shops. To the North_east and South west of{Peterlee,}industrial estates are to be found. A lot of men and women work in factories such as {Dewhursts}and{Linreed,}making clothes for large chain stores like{Marks & {Spencers.}Other factories include{DJB. {Peterlee Glass Company, Fisher_Price and{Tudor Crisps.}Some local men own large lorries and go to{Horden beach to collect sea coal. They can collect it because the nearby pit tips its waste coal in to the North sea. The sea separates the coal from the stones and fine coal pieces are washed ashore.{Peterlee's}population is now 23,000 and it has{17 schools. Peterlee also has it's own{Leisure Centre}where a variety of facilities are available.
